name: How it goes
description:
A human who is casually camping in a forest and then falls inside a portal, that makes  him fall in to another forest but it's rather different, he starts looking what is happening around and  finds a village, but  observing that everything look's  mediaval, while exploring what is going on he finds a big purple wolf in one house.

While in this new world the human discover that has more to do than just trying to find a way back home, he needs to face a evil that treathes the peace in this world and face many challenges.

A adventure waits our human in a new world.

Written and Illustrated by  @FwdKur on twitter
